page.title: 10LIVING IN WIMBLEDON
page.content: Wimbledon is a very nice town.It even has a very important tennis court.People from all over the world come to play against people from England.If it is raining the professionals and the beinners can go to the tennis club next to our school.Our school is called Garfield school and we have a park beside our school.It is called Garfield park.On the corner of Haydons Rd.,there is a small post office.On Wimbledon Common people take horses up there to ride.And some people like to take their dogs for walks up there.People also go to feed the ducks that live there.For the local transport we use buses,trains and tubes.Most people use the tube.
